30  package com.rultor.env.ec2;
31  
32  import com.amazonaws.regions.Regions;
33  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.AmazonEC2;
34  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.BlockDeviceMapping;
35  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.CreateTagsRequest;
36  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.DescribeImagesRequest;
37  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.DescribeImagesResult;
38  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.DescribeInstancesResult;
39  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.Instance;
40  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.Placement;
41  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.Reservation;
42  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.RunInstancesRequest;
43  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.RunInstancesResult;
44  import com.amazonaws.services.ec2.model.Tag;
45  import com.jcabi.aspects.Immutable;
46  import com.jcabi.aspects.Loggable;
47  import com.jcabi.aspects.RetryOnFailure;
48  import com.jcabi.aspects.Tv;
49  import com.jcabi.log.Logger;
50  import com.rultor.aws.EC2Client;
51  import com.rultor.env.Environment;
52  import com.rultor.env.Environments;
53  import com.rultor.snapshot.Step;
54  import com.rultor.snapshot.TagLine;
55  import com.rultor.spi.Coordinates;
56  import com.rultor.spi.Wallet;
57  import com.rultor.tools.Time;
58  import java.io.IOException;
59  import java.util.Collection;
60  import java.util.Collections;
61  import java.util.Iterator;
62  import java.util.LinkedList;
63  import java.util.List;
64  import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
65  import javax.validation.constraints.NotNull;
66  import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
67  import lombok.ToString;
68  import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
69  import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
70  
71  /**
72   * Amazon EC2 environments.
73   *
74   * @author Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)
75   * @version $Id$
76   * @since 1.0
77   * @checkstyle ClassDataAbstractionCoupling (500 lines)
78   */
79  @Immutable
80  @ToString
81  @EqualsAndHashCode(of = { "type", "ami", "group", "client" })
82  @Loggable(Loggable.DEBUG)
83  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ExcessiveImports")
84  public final class EC2 implements Environments {
85  
86      /**
87       * Coordinates we're in.
88       */
89      private final transient Coordinates work;
90  
91      /**
92       * Wallet to charge.
93       */
94      private final transient Wallet wallet;
95  
96      /**
97       * Type of EC2 instance.
98       */
99      private final transient String type;
100 
101     /**
102      * Name of AMI.
103      */
104     private final transient String ami;
105 
106     /**
107      * EC2 security group.
108      */
109     private final transient String group;
110 
111     /**
112      * EC2 key pair.
113      */
114     private final transient String pair;
115 
116     /**
117      * Availability zone to run in.
118      */
119     private final transient String zone;
120 
121     /**
122      * EC2 client.
123      */
124     private final transient EC2Client client;
125 
126     /**
127      * Public ctor.
128      * @param wrk Coordinates we're in
129      * @param wlt Wallet to charge
130      * @param tpe Instance type, for example "t1.micro"
131      * @param image AMI name
132      * @param grp Security group
133      * @param par Key pair
134      * @param akey AWS key
135      * @param scrt AWS secret
136      * @checkstyle ParameterNumber (5 lines)
137      */
138     public EC2(final Coordinates wrk, final Wallet wlt, final String tpe,
139         final String image, final String grp, final String par,
140         final String akey, final String scrt) {
141         this(
142             wrk, wlt, tpe, image, grp, par,
143             String.format("%sa", Regions.US_EAST_1.getName()),
144             new EC2Client.Simple(akey, scrt)
145         );
146     }
147 
148     /**
149      * Public ctor.
150      * @param wrk Coordinates we're in
151      * @param wlt Wallet to charge
152      * @param tpe Instance type, for example "t1.micro"
153      * @param image AMI name
154      * @param grp Security group
155      * @param par Key pair
156      * @param azone Availability zone
157      * @param akey AWS key
158      * @param scrt AWS secret
159      * @checkstyle ParameterNumber (5 lines)
160      */
161     public EC2(final Coordinates wrk, final Wallet wlt, final String tpe,
162         final String image, final String grp, final String par,
163         final String azone, final String akey, final String scrt) {
164         this(
165             wrk, wlt, tpe, image, grp, par,
166             azone, new EC2Client.Simple(akey, scrt)
167         );
168     }
169 
170     /**
171      * Public ctor.
172      * @param wrk Coordinates we're in
173      * @param wlt Wallet to charge
174      * @param tpe Instance type, for example "t1.micro"
175      * @param image AMI name
176      * @param grp Security group
177      * @param par Key pair
178      * @param azone Availability zone
179      * @param clnt EC2 client
180      * @checkstyle ParameterNumber (10 lines)
181      */
182     public EC2(
183         @NotNull(message = "work can't be NULL") final Coordinates wrk,
184         @NotNull(message = "wallet can't be NULL") final Wallet wlt,
185         @NotNull(message = "instance type can't be NULL") final String tpe,
186         @NotNull(message = "AMI can't be NULL") final String image,
187         @NotNull(message = "security group can't be NULL") final String grp,
188         @NotNull(message = "key pair can't be NULL") final String par,
189         @NotNull(message = "avlt zone can't be NULL") final String azone,
190         @NotNull(message = "AWS client can't be NULL") final EC2Client clnt) {
191         Validate.isTrue(
192             image.matches("ami-[a-f0-9]{8}"),
193             "AMI name `%s` is in wrong format", image
194         );
195         Validate.isTrue(
196             azone.matches("[a-z]{2}\\-[a-z]+\\-\\d[a-z]"),
197             "availability zone `%s` is in wrong format", azone
198         );
199         this.work = wrk;
200         this.wallet = wlt;
201         this.type = tpe;
202         this.ami = image;
203         this.group = grp;
204         this.pair = par;
205         this.zone = azone;
206         this.client = new EC2Client.Regional(
207             StringUtils.stripEnd(azone, "abcdef"), clnt
208         );
209     }
210 
211     @Override
212     public Environment acquire() throws IOException {
213         return this.env(this.create().getInstanceId());
214     }
215 
216     @Override
217     public Iterator<Environment> iterator() {
218         final AmazonEC2 aws = this.client.get();
219         try {
220             final Collection<Environment> envs = new LinkedList<Environment>();
221             final DescribeInstancesResult result = aws.describeInstances();
222             for (Reservation res : result.getReservations()) {
223                 for (Instance inst : res.getInstances()) {
224                     envs.add(this.env(inst.getInstanceId()));
225                 }
226             }
227             return Collections.unmodifiableCollection(envs).iterator();
228         } finally {
229             aws.shutdown();
230         }
231     }
232 
233     /**
234      * Make an environment with this ID.
235      * @param inst Instance ID
236      * @return Environment
237      */
238     private Environment env(final String inst) {
239         return new EC2Environment(this.work, this.wallet, inst, this.client);
240     }
241 
242     /**
243      * Create EC2 instance.
244      * @return Instance created and in stable state
245      */
246     @Step(
247         before = "creating EC2 instance `${this.type}` from `${this.ami}`",
248         // @checkstyle LineLength (1 line)
249         value = "EC2 `${result.instanceType}` instance `${result.instanceId}` created in `${this.zone}`"
250     )
251     private Instance create() {
252         final AmazonEC2 aws = this.client.get();
253         try {
254             final RunInstancesResult result = aws.runInstances(
255                 new RunInstancesRequest()
256                     .withInstanceType(this.type)
257                     .withImageId(this.ami)
258                     .withSecurityGroups(this.group)
259                     .withKeyName(this.pair)
260                     .withPlacement(
261                         new Placement().withAvailabilityZone(this.zone)
262                     )
263                     .withMinCount(1)
264                     .withMaxCount(1)
265                     .withBlockDeviceMappings(this.devices(aws))
266                     .withInstanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior("terminate")
267             );
268             final List<Instance> instances =
269                 result.getReservation().getInstances();
270             if (instances.isEmpty()) {
271                 throw new IllegalStateException(
272                     String.format(
273                         "failed to run an EC2 instance `%s` with AMI `%s`",
274                         this.type, this.ami
275                     )
276                 );
277             }
278             final Instance instance = instances.get(0);
279             new TagLine("ec2")
280                 .attr("id", instance.getInstanceId())
281                 .attr("type", instance.getInstanceType())
282                 .attr("image", instance.getImageId())
283                 .attr("key", instance.getKeyName())
284                 .attr("ip", instance.getPublicIpAddress())
285                 .attr("kernel", instance.getKernelId())
286                 .attr("az", instance.getPlacement().getAvailabilityZone())
287                 .markdown(
288                     Logger.format(
289                         "instance `%s` of type `%s` from `%s` in %s",
290                         instance.getInstanceId(), instance.getInstanceType(),
291                         instance.getImageId(),
292                         instance.getPlacement().getAvailabilityZone()
293                     )
294                 )
295                 .log();
296             return this.wrap(aws, instance);
297         } finally {
298             aws.shutdown();
299         }
300     }
301 
302     /**
303      * Get device mappings.
304      * @param aws EC2 client
305      * @return Block device mappings
306      */
307     private Collection<BlockDeviceMapping> devices(final AmazonEC2 aws) {
308         final DescribeImagesResult result = aws.describeImages(
309             new DescribeImagesRequest().withImageIds(this.ami)
310         );
311         if (result.getImages().isEmpty()) {
312             throw new IllegalArgumentException(
313                 String.format("AMI %s not found", this.ami)
314             );
315         }
316         final Collection<BlockDeviceMapping> devices =
317             result.getImages().get(0).getBlockDeviceMappings();
318         for (BlockDeviceMapping device : devices) {
319             if (device.getEbs() != null) {
320                 device.getEbs().setDeleteOnTermination(true);
321             }
322         }
323         return devices;
324     }
325 
326     /**
327      * Add tags and do some other wrapping to the running instance.
328      * @param aws AWS client
329      * @param instance Instance running (maybe already)
330      * @return The same instance
331      */
332     @RetryOnFailure(
333         attempts = Tv.TEN,
334         delay = 2,
335         unit = TimeUnit.MINUTES,
336         verbose = false
337     )
338     private Instance wrap(final AmazonEC2 aws, final Instance instance) {
339         aws.createTags(
340             new CreateTagsRequest()
341                 .withResources(instance.getInstanceId())
342                 .withTags(
343                     new Tag()
344                         .withKey("Name")
345                         .withValue(this.work.rule()),
346                     new Tag()
347                         .withKey("urn:rultor:rule")
348                         .withValue(this.work.rule()),
349                     new Tag()
350                         .withKey("urn:rultor:owner")
351                         .withValue(this.work.owner().toString()),
352                     new Tag()
353                         .withKey("urn:rultor:scheduled")
354                         .withValue(this.work.scheduled().toString()),
355                     new Tag()
356                         .withKey("urn:rultor:created")
357                         .withValue(new Time().toString())
358                 )
359         );
360         return instance;
361     }
362 
363 }
